There are direct buses from Transportes Esmeraldas, Panamericana and Occidental leaving to Quito and Guayaquil every day, around 7 - 8 hours. Transesmeraldas also has buses to Cuenca, Machala, Huaquillas, Portoviejo y Manta. AeroTaxi even has buses to Ibarra and Otavalo.
30 - 40 min. There are even direct flights from Cali, Colombia. From the small airport you take a cab and arrives in 30 minutes to Atacames.
Good roads allow easy access by car, about 4-5 hours from Quito by car. Some prefer the way via Los Bancos, others via Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas.

To the south there is Sua, a little fisher village and an other 5 minutes away Same, a hotel resort village. Be aware that this small villages are totally empty beside highseason in July and August.
